Description.Title: Soil Temperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: A 1D soil heat flow and temperature profile component which simulates temperatures from the air node through the soil surface and into layered soil using Campbell (1985) physics. The soil is represented by nodes (air, surface, one per layer, plus phantom nodes below the profile) and solved with a Thomas tridiagonal algorithm for transient heat conduction. Volumetric heat capacity and thermal conductivity are estimated from soil constituents (rocks, organic matter, sand, silt, clay, water, air) and soil water, then mapped from layers to nodes. The model couples to the atmosphere via a stability-corrected boundary layer conductance and net radiation (short- and long-wave) computed from weather and canopy/residue effects. It runs with sub-daily iterations (default 48 per day), supports initial layer temperatures, and reports daily minimum, maximum, average, and final soil and surface temperatures.
Description.ShortDescription: 1D soil temperature component based on Campbell (1985), solving transient heat conduction with atmospheric coupling and sub-daily timesteps.

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness by layer

Input.name: physical_BD
Input.description: Soil bulk density by layer

Input.name: physical_Rocks
Input.description: Rock fragment content by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
Input.description: Sand fraction by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
Input.description: Silt fraction by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
Input.description: Clay fraction by layer

Input.name: organic_Carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon content by layer

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

Input.name: waterBalance_Salb
Input.description: Soil surface albedo

Input.name: waterBalance_Eo
Input.description: Reference potential evaporation

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Potential soil evaporation supply

Input.name: waterBalance_Es
Input.description: Actual soil evaporation

Input.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Mean annual air temperature

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude

Input.name: weather_Latitude
Input.description: Site latitude

Input.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
Input.description: Day of year

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Specified instrument (wind/temperature) height above surface

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperatures for layers (top to bottom from topsoil node)

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth at which seasonal temperature is constant

Input.name: weather_MeanT
Input.description: Daily mean air temperature

Input.name: weather_MaxT
Input.description: Daily maximum air temperature

Input.name: weather_MinT
Input.description: Daily minimum air temperature

Input.name: weather_AirPressure
Input.description: Mean sea level or station air pressure

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily global solar radiation

Input.name: weather_Wind
Input.description: Wind speed at instrument height

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Soil layer count (profile)

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Thermal nodes including phantom nodes (excl. air node)

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Depth of nodes (air, surface, and subsurface nodes)

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Node/layer thickness array including phantom nodes

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density array including phantom nodes

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rock content array including phantom nodes

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon array including phantom nodes

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand content array including phantom nodes

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt content array including phantom nodes

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay content array including phantom nodes

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Current node/layer soil water (mapped) used for thermal property calculations

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Effective soil thermal conductivity at nodes including air-node conductance

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: Inter-nodal thermal conductance coefficients

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Thermal storage term per node

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature at air/surface/subsurface nodes

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Provisional updated node temperatures used in solver iterations

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures around dawn (~5:00)

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily mean soil temperature per node (accumulator)

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Daily accumulated boundary-layer conductance for heat at surface

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Current air temperature used as upper boundary condition

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation into soil used in heat flux balance (per internal step)

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

Input.name: doInitialisationStuff
Input.description: Flag indicating first-day initialisation is pending

Input.name: internalTimeStep
Input.description: Internal integration time step

Input.name: timeOfDaySecs
Input.description: Current time-of-day within the daily loop

Input.name: soilRoughnessHeight
Input.description: Minimum aerodynamic roughness height used to set canopy height lower bound

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height used for boundary-layer conductance (max of microClimate height and roughness)

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument height used in conductance calculations (ensured >= canopyHeight + 0.5 m)

Input.name: nu
Input.description: Solver weighting factor (Crank–Nicolson parameter)

Input.name: ps
Input.description: Particle density of soil minerals

Input.name: pom
Input.description: Particle density of organic matter

Input.name: soilConstituentNames
Input.description: Ordered list of soil constituents used in thermal property mixing

Input.name: timestep
Input.description: External time step for daily loop

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Hour of daily maximum air temperature used in diurnal interpolation

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Boundary-layer conductance method (calc or constant)

Input.name: netRadiationSource
Input.description: Net radiation source (calc or eos)

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Final node soil temperatures after daily integration

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperatures captured around dawn (~5:00)

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily averaged soil temperature per node

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Accumulated boundary-layer conductance for heat at the surface

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Effective thermal conductivity at nodes (including surface air-node conductance)

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Thermal storage term per node used in solver

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: Inter-nodal thermal conductance coefficients after update

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Provisional node temperatures at end of day

Output.name: internalTimeStep
Output.description: Internal time step used during the day

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Time-of-day counter at end of daily loop

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Air temperature at the last internal step

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation into soil for the last internal step

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored maximum air temperature of the current day for use on next day

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored minimum air temperature of the current day for use on next day

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Canopy height used for conductance (m) after update

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Instrument height used in conductance after enforcing minimum above canopy

Output.name: doInitialisationStuff
Output.description: Initialisation flag after first day (0=initialised)

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division with fallback value on zero denominator

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if array contains any valid (non-sentinel) numeric values

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Partial sum of values between start and end indices, skipping sentinel

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Zeroes all elements of an array

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thicknesses

Function.name: boundCheck
Function.description: Range check placeholder (no enforcement)

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of sand (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of silt (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of clay (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of water (corrected for OM fraction)

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of ice (here zero)

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of air as residual of other fractions

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns constituent-specific volumetric heat capacity constants

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns constituent property used for thermal mixing

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Shape factor for Maxwell–Eucken type mixing (phase geometry)

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Stefan–Boltzmann longwave radiation

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps layer values to nodes by depth-weighted interpolation

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes soil thermal conductivity pedotransfer coefficients

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Seasonal soil temperature profile by depth and phase shift

Function.name: calcLayerTemperature
Function.description: Analytic layer temperature with depth lag and exponential damping

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Initial surface temperature from albedo, air temperature, and radiation

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Diurnal distribution of solar radiation, cloud factor, and vapor constant

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes net soil radiation (shortwave+longwave) per internal step

Function.name: math_sin
Function.description: Wrapper for math.sin

Function.name: math_cos
Function.description: Wrapper for math.cos

Function.name: math_log
Function.description: Wrapper for math.log

Function.name: math_exp
Function.description: Wrapper for math.exp

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Iterative bulk boundary-layer conductance with stability corrections

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sinusoidal scheme

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat at nodes from constituents and water

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity at nodes from constituents

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Thomas algorithm to solve tridiagonal heat diffusion system

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Updates min/max/mean soil temperatures and accumulates conductance

Function.name: getIniVariables
Function.description: Initial instrument height and input checks

Function.name: getProfileVariables
Function.description: Builds node/layer geometric and property arrays (adds phantom nodes)

Function.name: readParam
Function.description: Computes thermal parameters and initial seasonal temperature profile

Function.name: OnStartOfSimulation
Function.description: Initialises state, profile, parameters, and starting temperatures

Function.name: OnProcess
Function.description: Main daily loop: radiation, boundary-layer conductance, heat diffusion
